text: "4th of July, Asbury Park (Sandy)" is a 1973 song by Bruce Springsteen and appeared on his second studio album The Wild, the Innocent & the E Street Shuffle. It was covered by British band The Hollies for their 15th studio album Another Night. It went to number 12 in New Zealand and number 85 in the United States. == References == Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:The Hollies songs Category:Air Supply songs Category:Ben E. King songs Category:Kiss (band) songs
title: 4th of July, Asbury Park (Sandy)
